overview:
Mark Lugo is a writer and television producer who has produced several reality TV shows and television variety show properties.

Born and raised in the Bronx, New York, Lugo boasts about Yankee Stadium being his first job. During his high school years he worked at 30 Rock, home of NBC studios and birthplace of the Saturday Night Live show. Lugo majored in Criminal Justice while attending John Jay College of Criminal Justice. Lugo transferred to U of M where he changed his major to Journalism.

Lugo produced the reality TV show El Gran Peleador in Central America. He has also produced Glamour TV, a music variety Spanish language show.

Lugo has produced many concerts event throughout Miami, Los Angeles and New York. He owns a restaurant in Central America.
